$comment: definition of the schema for issuing a judgement order

judgementId.description: alphanumeric string representing the judgement ID

name.description: string having a max of 100 alphabets. no numbers

fatherName.description: string having a max of 100 alphabets. no numbers

occupation.description: string having a max of 100 alphabets. no numbers

address.description: string having a max of 400 characters and matches any character (including newline characters)

age.description: age in years and will accept decimals so age can be 10.5 meaning 10 years 6 months

advocateName.description: string having a max of 100 alphabets. no numbers

complaintDate.description: date of filing of complaint before the court

apprehensionDate.description: date of first appearance of the accused/respondent

trailClosureDate.description: date of last hearing before judgement hearing
